name: CreateIncidentNotificationTemplate
description:
Creates a new incident notification template.

Use this tool to create a new notification template for incidents. It should be called when there is a need to set up or customize notifications related to incident management.

parameters.name: notification_template_category
parameters.description: The category of the notification template.

value_schema.description: The category of the notification template.

parameters.name: notification_content_body
parameters.description: The body content for the notification template, describing the detailed message of the notification.

value_schema.description: The content body of the notification template.

parameters.name: notification_template_name
parameters.description: The name for the notification template to be created.

value_schema.description: The name of the notification template.

parameters.name: notification_subject
parameters.description: The subject line for the notification template. This sets the subject of the template being created.

value_schema.description: The subject line of the notification template.

parameters.name: resource_type_notification_template
parameters.description: Specify the resource type for notification templates, which should be 'notification_templates'.

parameters.name: incident_type_id
parameters.description: The ID of the incident type to associate with the notification template.

parameters.name: incident_type_resource_type
parameters.description: The resource type for the incident, which should be 'incident_types'.
